an9.30:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these nine methods to get rid of resentment.
an9.30:4.3: Thinking: ‘They did wrong by me, but what can I do?’ you get rid of resentment.
an9.30:4.4: Thinking: ‘They are doing wrong by me …’ …
an9.30:4.6: ‘They did wrong by someone I love …’ …
an9.30:4.7: ‘They are doing wrong by someone I love …’
an9.30:4.8: ‘They will do wrong by someone I love …’ …
an9.30:4.10: They are helping someone I dislike …’ …
an9.30:4.11: Thinking: ‘They will help someone I dislike, but what can I do?’ you get rid of resentment.
an9.30:4.12: These are the nine ways of getting rid of resentment.”
